name: Arrow Fury
description:
It's just a prototype of what I'm currently working.

Controls : Tap on the screen to where you want to shoot.

!!! WAIT FOR 5 SECONDS AFTER LEVEL COMPLETION. THERE ARE ONLY 2 LEVELS FOR NOW SO PRESS MAIN MENU BUTTON AFTER 2nd LEVEL COMPLETION. !!!

NOTE !!! There"s main source on github of the original game. Im just modifying and make a complete build of that idea.

Do give your valuable feedback on this protptype so I can do make a better playable. <3
